name: Galactic Drift
description:
Fight for your freedom!

Play as one of two factions as they duel over galactic stakes!

Control one of three unique ship types!

GaiVaige - Lead Programmer

DracoArt - Art

BlueCrashMattress. T34Shadow, IMxSCARED, Deccassolvakia - Game Design and Level Design

Unrelated Acts - Music (https://soundcloud.com/unrelated_acts)
